sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_93097e9c1b33f0d07294db1ee54bcbc6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="NSPro New Site Request">896a88191b3274107294db1ee54bcb96</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:f215d9bc1b63fc1090990f6fe54bcb37</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>nsw2 set svc options on cat change</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    // This script will filter the service selection box based on some prior answers. 
	// This script is triggered when either the service category is changed or when
	// the HA required variable is changed a similar script gets triggered.
	// 
	//jslog("nsw2: The service category value = " + g_form.getValue('req_network_service_category'));
	// The jslog is not supported on the service portal. Instead can use console.info, console.warn or console. error depending on the context of the message. 
    //jslog("nsw2: changed svc cat to " + newValue);
	console.info("nsw2: changed svc cat to " + newValue); // 1= "Guaranteed Service (Enterprise WAN)", 2 = "Best Effort Service"
	var svcBronzeSilverGold = "";
	if (newValue == 1) {
		var ha = g_form.getValue("req_redundancy");
		console.info("nsw2: guarnteed svc, ha = " + ha);
		if (ha == 'Yes') {
			svcBronzeSilverGold = "Gold";
		} else {
			svcBronzeSilverGold = "Silver";
		}		
	} else {
		svcBronzeSilverGold = "Bronze";
	}
	console.info("nsw2: svcBronzeSilverGold for service search is " + svcBronzeSilverGold);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rlwilliams11</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-09 17:45:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>93097e9c1b33f0d07294db1ee54bcbc6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>nsw2 set svc options on cat change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="dit nsw22" source="x_g_sonc_dit_nsw22">d39e882e1ba038147294db1ee54bcb83</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="dit nsw22">d39e882e1ba038147294db1ee54bcb83</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_93097e9c1b33f0d07294db1ee54bcbc6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rlwilliams11</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-10 17:50:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
